src_original: abhyarcya sarvatathāgatakule praviṣṭas tad ahaṃ tu vajrajñānam utpādayiṣyāmi /  yena jñānena sarvatathāgatasiddhir api prāpsyase /
tataḥ svayaṃ vajrācāryaḥ krodhaterintirīm evaṃ ūrdhvamukhīṃ baddhvā vajraṃ śiṣyasya mūrdhni sthāpyaivaṃ vadet /
ayaṃ te samayavajro mūrdhniṃ te sphārayed yadi tvaṃ kasyacid brūyāḥ /  tatas tayaiva samayamudrayodakaṃ śayathā hṛdayena satkṛtya parijapya tasmai vajraśiṣyāya pāyayed iti /
